alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Salt Lake... eastern Davis and west central Morgan Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Salt Lake, or near Salt Lake City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Farmington, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Cottonwood Heights, Clearfield, Midvale, Kaysville, Holladay, Syracuse, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake and Centerville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 294 and 335. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 110 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
